product.name: Cable-Knit Cotton Sweater - Babies
product.short_description:
An icon of heritage American design, Polo Ralph Lauren spins cotton into the Cable-Knit Cotton Sweater, finished with their signature embroidered pony for a preppy heritage polish.

- Cotton cable knit; natural stretch
- Slim fit; designed to hit at hip
- Crew neckline
- Long sleeves
- Ribbed cuffs and hemline

items: The main material of this product is made with at least 50% organic cotton. Organic cotton is grown without the use of harmful chemicals. Organic cotton farming is more protective of natural resources and biodiversity than conventional farming.

product.name: Pink Baby Knit Cardigan - Babies
product.short_description:
Launched in 2010, Milky creates durable everyday designs for busy little babies and kids. The brand offers a range of clothes and accessories for boys and girls, with a focus on an accessible price point and wearable styles. With pops of colour, embellished flourishes and playful prints, Milky is the perfect foundation for any child's wardrobe.

- Length: 28cm (Size 00)
- Knitted cotton fabrication
- Long sleeves
- Wood-look functional buttons placed diagonally
- Regular fit
